summary: AN ORDINANCE related to cable television; authorizing the Chief Technology Officer to execute an Assignment of Cable Franchise Consent Agreement for the purpose of implementing and administering the transfer of control, subject to conditions, of the nonexclusive franchise agreement authorized by Ordinance 122514 and held by Broadstripe, LLC, to WaveDivision I, LLC, a wholly-owned subsidiary of WaveDivision Holdings, LLC; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
note: The executed copy of the cable franchise assignment agreement has been added to the PDF copy of the ordinance, available through the link marked "Electronic Copy."
